SELECT pa.`id` AS id,p.name AS postName,pa.`people_number` AS reqPeople,p.`id` AS postId FROM t_activity_assignment aa LEFT JOIN t_post_assignment pa ON aa.id = pa.`activity_assignment_id` LEFT JOIN t_post p ON p.id = pa.`post_id` WHERE aa.`id` = #{activityAssignmentId} AND aa.`status` = '1'
AND pa.`allowed_title_id` in (#{userTitleId},0)
AND pa.`allowed_department_id` in(#{userDepartmentId},0)
And p.`name`!=#{ignorePostName}
AND p.`del_flag` = 0 AND aa.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY p.id
SELECT p.`name` FROM t_post_assignment pa LEFT JOIN t_post p ON pa.`post_id` = p.`id` WHERE pa.`id` = #{postAssignmentId} AND p.`del_flag` = 0

SELECT pa.id AS id,p.`id` AS postId,p.`name` AS postName,pa.`people_number` AS reqPeople,pa.`allowed_department_id`,pa.`allowed_title_id` FROM t_post_assignment pa LEFT JOIN t_activity_assignment aa ON pa.`activity_assignment_id` = aa.`id` LEFT JOIN t_post p ON p.id = pa.`post_id` WHERE aa.id =#{activityAssignmentId} AND aa.`del_flag` = 0 AND p.`del_flag` = 0
